profileAlternative.name: Carlo Geenen
profileAlternative.headline: Automation Tester and Java Developer bij Alliander

positions.title: Automated smart EV charging with smart metering and DALI smart grid data
positions.description: Can individual EV charging stations be controlled in their maximum output current by a smart meter based on DALI smart grid load data? This can have great potential for a grid operator in providing maximum up-time in their grid in the fast changing and increasing energy demand using existing smart grid facilities.

positions.title: Java Software Developer and Tester
positions.description: Facilitating the energy transition with IOT.

positions.title: Automation Agile Tester and DevOps Java Developer
positions.description:
The Cardnet application in the CCV IT landscape is responsible for transaction processing from for example creditcards and other payment cards for customers, (web)shops and banks. The integration, up time and accuracy are very critical in combination with a huge amount of specific customers and their specific requirements. For future purposes a new application is build from scratch with higher performance output and reliability.

In these applications, automated testing is very important to maintain all this functionality and to get reliable feedback fast. The tests are created with Cucumber in Java. I also translate business requirements to implementation and build new software projects and infrastructure in the Agile DevOps team. Further I help CCV with my Scrum Master knowledge to work more efficiënt in an Agile environment.

…
see more

positions.title: Java Software Developer and Tester
positions.description:
As a member of Smart Society Services, I am working as a Java developer and tester in a DevOps Agile project team. The Smart Meter Headend and Zown Microgrids is a part of the OSGP "open, generic, scalable and independent ‘Internet of Things’ platform which enables various public service objects to be easily controlled and monitored with any application and with any communication infrastructure."

I fulfill the roles of a software developer, software tester and scrum master within the dynamic project team.

Application examples are managing 10 million smart energy meters by a grid operator and a independent micro grid energy supply which is already live on the Dutch island Pampus.
…
see more

positions.title: Software Engineer
positions.description: Starting new internal and external projects for software development in C++, Java and Ruby.

positions.title: Software Assembly Integrator
positions.description:
As software assembly integrator I am responsible for a successful integration of individual software deliveries from Prodrive Technologies within the software framework of ASML.
This requires meeting quality standards and hard deadlines, writing test specifications, proto testing, software implementing, compiling, merging, reviewing, integrating and testing software in ASML software context. Further the development cluster was a pilot within ASML to work with assembly integration. Despite the pilot and the fact that software integration is the last link of the chain I always achieved deadlines, planning and quality. At the same moment, this is the first group within ASML that works according the new software assembly releasing pilot. This means testing and discovering new processes, tools and reporting improvements or malfunctioning as at will be rolled out throughout the whole company.
…
see more

positions.title: Prodrive Technologies
positions.description:
As product coordinator I am responsible for the coordination of maintenance and support after the launch of the in-line automated electrical test machine. It has to be more mature so it can be used in a larger scale with higher production targets and more test coverage. This means carry out quality improvements and automation for the test developers. I also focused on improving and developing new and accurate measuring and programming of the products. But also automating of test development, and developing accurate, faster measuring solutions. And updating documentation of processes, and act on malfunction issues.
…

As project leader I am overall responsible for the achievement of the internal projects that derived from using the test machine on a larger scale, I have been responsible in controlling and supporting technical aspects to achieve milestones and project targets according the ‘first time right’ principle. As a project leader I startup internal projects when I determine needs for development for the test machine. Also reviewing technical specification documents for new functionalities and give feedback when needed to team members.
